sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The petition of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament. Presented to His Majestie at Beverly the 16. of July 1642. With His Majesties answer thereunto. England and Wales. Parliament. England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
14 p.
Printed by Evan Tyler ..., Edinburgh, : anno 1642.
"By the King. Our expresse pleasure is, that this our answer be read and published throughout all churches and chappels of the kingdome of England and dominion of Wales by the severall parsons, vicars, or curates of the same." Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======
The petition of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament. Presented to His Majestie at Beverly the 16. of July 1642. With His Majesties answer thereunto. England and Wales. Parliament. England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
14 p.
Printed by Evan Tyler ..., Edinburgh, : anno 1642.
"By the King. Our expresse pleasure is, that this our answer be read and published throughout all churches and chappels of the kingdome of England and dominion of Wales by the severall parsons, vicars, or curates of the same." Reproduction of original in the British Library.
Evan Tyler
